name: Mathligaya
description:
Description

Play as an owner of the famous sari-sari store in town. Mathligaya Tindahan is the most liked and talked sari store there is in barangay 221. Interact with various lively customers as they all line up to your store. Manage and give correct answers as they all brought their favourite and desired items to your store, the player must use their mathematical skills as they calculate the amount of price that needs to be solved. Be the best sari-sari store there is in the town!

Project Objective

The primary objective of this project is to create a fun and engaging video game to further augment the computational skills of grade 6 elementary students in using the four rudimentary operations of math, addition, subtraction, division, and multiplication, by allowing them to practice through an enjoyable medium, video games.

 The secondary objectives are as follows:

  • To motivate students to willingly learn outside of class
  • Provide an opportunity and option to practice math outside the classroom or in computer labs.
